mapper.update:
update T_NB_DWDB
ND = #{nd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
XYDM = #{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZQR = #{zqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZWR = #{zwr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZZQZL = #{zzqzl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZZQSE = #{zzqse,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LXZWQX = #{lxzwqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BZQJ = #{bzqj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BZFS = #{bzfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BZDBFW = #{bzdbfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_NB_DWDB set ND = #{nd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, XYDM = #{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZQR = #{zqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZWR = #{zwr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZZQZL = #{zzqzl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZZQSE = #{zzqse,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LXZWQX = #{lxzwqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZQJ = #{bzqj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZFS = #{bzfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZDBFW = #{bzdbfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into T_NB_BD_DWDB (ID, ND, XYDM, ZQR, ZWR, ZZQZL, ZZQSE, LXZWQX, BZQJ, BZFS, BZDBFW, SJLY) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zwr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzqzl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzqse,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lxzwqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bzqj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bzfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bzdbfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 2)
mapper.select:
select 'false' as QUERYID,
from T_NB_DWDB where (xydm,nd) in(select a.hcdw_xydm,b.nd from t_hcrw a,t_hcrw_nd b where a.id=b.hcrw_id and a.id=#{hcrwId})

select 'false' as QUERYID,
from T_NB_BD_DWDB where (xydm,nd) in(select a.hcdw_xydm,b.nd from t_hcrw a,t_hcrw_nd b where a.id=b.hcrw_id and a.id=#{hcrwId}) AND SJLY = 1

select 'false' as QUERYID,
from T_NB_BD_DWDB where (xydm,nd) in(select a.hcdw_xydm,b.nd from t_hcrw a,t_hcrw_nd b where a.id=b.hcrw_id and a.id=#{hcrwId}) AND SJLY = 2
